de.mbrero.see.models

Class DBAnnotationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mbrero.see.models.DBAnnotationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntityWriter<Annotation>

    public class DBAnnotationModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntityWriter<Annotation>
    Saves annotations to a database table defined by the Annotation bean.
    Author:
    massimiliano.brero@studium.fernuni-hagen.de
